Move to Bali with Kids — by Empathy School

A calm, comprehensive guide to moving to Bali

Visas, housing, neighborhoods, learning, day-to-day logistics—written for parents, with checklists and lived experience.

Start hereLearn about Empathy School
What this site is

A content hub that answers the questions families actually type into Google when they’re considering Bali. It’s designed to be useful on its own, while naturally guiding the right families toward Empathy School.

Start with a pillar

Choose the topic that matches your stage, then follow the linked deep-dives.

pillar

Start here: a parent-first roadmap

A step-by-step roadmap for families considering Bali—what to decide first, what to delay, and how to reduce stress.

Explore Bali areas

Short, honest area guides for families—where it’s calm, where it’s busy, and what daily life feels like.

areasEast Bali2026-02-221 min

Amed for families

A quiet coastal stretch in East Bali—beautiful and slow, but better for families who are happy with fewer services and more intentional routines.

ReadView all
areasCanggu region2026-02-221 min

Berawa for families

A popular pocket near Canggu with many family services—convenient, but traffic can be intense at peak times.

ReadView all
areasCanggu region2026-02-221 min

Canggu for families

International energy, lots of activities and cafes—also busier roads and more stimulation than many parents expect.

ReadView all
areasDenpasar2026-02-221 min

Denpasar for families

Practical city life: services, shopping, and admin tasks are easier—best for families who want convenience over “tropical village” vibes.

ReadView all
areasBukit Peninsula2026-02-221 min

Jimbaran for families

A more residential feel with beaches and access—often a practical compromise for families who want less hype.

ReadView all
areasSeminyak & surrounds2026-02-221 min

Kerobokan for families

More residential in parts, often better value than the busiest beach pockets—good for families who want a practical base near the action.

ReadView all
